list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a soft white fibrous substance that surrounds the seeds of a tropical and subtropical plant and is used as textile fiber and thread for sewing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a cargo of cotton and wheat
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một hàng hóa của bông và lúa mì

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the plant that is commercially grown for cotton products. Oil and a protein-rich flour are also obtained from the seeds.
